title: American Farms: Past, Present, and Future
description: American farms have changed dramatically over the past two hundred years. American Farms: Past, Present, and Future provides students a comprehensive look at these changes, including predictions about how farms will continue to change in the future. This book includes helpful graphs and charts as well as interesting sidebars that give students more information about farming. It can also be used to teach students how to compare and contrast details as well as to connect to prior knowledge to better understand text.
